options.content:
# Costgraph

Costgraph is the foundational "Data Driven FinOps for Modern Infrastructure" solution to enterprise teams.

Check out the product at [costgraph.baselinehq.cloud](https://costgraph.baselinehq.cloud) and the docs at [docs.baselinehq.cloud](https://docs.baselinehq.cloud).

## What does this dashboard offer?

This dashboard offers an aggregate look at the metrics costgraph provides, this crosses metrics for
- costs 
- rightsizings
- usage 
- resource breakdown

## Is this the best dashboard?

As much as Prometheus and Grafana are a standard, there are limits to its dashboard capabilities with its columnar driven data pattern.

It is recommended to use the Superset dashboard if you desire finer metrics and better visuals, this will work just fine for most of your needs.


## Does this get updated?

It might after a while. Check out the [costgraph-manifests repository](https://github.com/baselinehq/costgraph-manifests) for new updates to the dashboard json.
